snippet.title: Final Fantasy X Original PS2 Trailer - 1080p HD (The Best FFX Trailer Ever)
snippet.description:
Original Final Fantasy X Trailer from Final Fantasy The Spirits Within Special Edition DVD.
I upscaled it the best I could, because it looked like garbage on the DVD.
Personally, I think this is the best FF Trailer ever made! 

Facebook --- https://www.facebook.com/FuszionX
Twitter -------- https://twitter.com/FuszionX
